inclusion.criterion: Pre- and post-pubertal patients who are diagnosed with conditions that necessitate chemo- or radiotherapy and wish to preserve their ovarian function.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients older than 40 years of age.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: 19 yo Hispanic female G1P1 at 32+ 6 weeks of gestational age with mild headache and leg swelling, BP 146/99, urine dipstick with 3+ proteins. No fever or chills, no shortness of breath, cough, chest pain, orthopnea and palpitations or skin rash observed.
